ezRNAseq
  • Reference

Annotate using biomart

  • ez_annotate(): annotate a list of gene names or ensembl ids using biomaRt
  • ez_biotype_stat(): Make a stat summary of gene biotype 

ez_annotate(x, host = "www.ensembl.org", dataset = "hsapiens_gene_ensembl")

ez_biotype_stat(count_data, biotype, samples = NULL, compact = FALSE)

Arguments

x
a vector of ids, matrix or a data frame. if x is a matrix or data frame, Then rownames is taken as ids. Ids can be Ensembl ids or gene names
dataset
Dataset you want to use. See ?biomaRt::useMart
count_data
a data frame containing raw read count
biotype
the column containing biotype data of each gene
samples
a vector of sample names for which you want to do the stat
compact
logical for making compact statistique

Contents

  • Arguments
